page.title: 13Leisure/Darras Hall&Medburn
page.content:
{Parents... { {"Sports Clubs"} Badminton, Squash,Golf,Tennis { {"Societies"} Round Table, Ladies Circle,Lions,Reperatory Group, National Housewives Register. { {"Classes"}Keep Fit,Bridge, Aerobics, china restoring,Antiques, Floral Art { {Children...} Ballet,Music,Orchestra, Riding,Judo,Mini-Rugby.Beavers,Cubs, Scouts,Guides,Boys Brigade,Brownies.
Many activities are held in school or church halls.Apart from private club premises,there is a large Sports Centre nearby and an Agricultural College where cooking,craft and some gardening classes are held.
